teams.name: hi5 Community on Kiva!
teams.loan_because: “Kiva’s principles of entrepreneurship, serving a global community, and leveraging the power of crowds are very complementary to hi5’s mission, so it seems only natural that we join them in the fight to help eradicate poverty in many parts of the developing world,” said Ramu Yalamanchi, CEO of hi5. “By linking our user base with the profiles of Kiva entrepreneurs, we are connecting a diverse group of people who want to change our world for the better and ensure the right resources exist to do it.”
teams.description: Headquartered in San Francisco, hi5 is one of the world’s largest and fastest growing social networks and mobile web networks. Our focus is to empower our users to build and maintain connections between friends and family online. With over 56 million unique visitors every month, hi5 is a top 20 website globally and the number one social network in 31 countries across Latin America, Europe, Asia and Africa. The service is available in 37 languages, delivering localized content and applications to users worldwide.

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
We are a group of like minded New Yorkers who connect to make a difference.

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.name: Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster

http://www.loose-canon.info/page17.htm

Secular vs religious Field Partners, see links at http://atheist-monkey.blogspot.de/2009/08/kiva-mfi-checker.html

teams.name: Friends & Family of the Weschlers
teams.loan_because: We believe in "Healing the World" one day at a time, one person at a time, one family at a time - and we do this by teaching our children to be Agents of Change and by modeling that axiom ourselves.
teams.description: We are the friends and families related to the Weschlers. We believe in teaching our children to grow up and know that they can each make a difference. When we combine our efforts  working together - we can make a real impact.

teams.name: Polycom
teams.loan_because: Polycom and its employees believe that part of being a successful company is also being a socially responsible and involved corporate citizen in the global community. Our Global Citizenship Program leverages the strength of Polycom's great products, resources and people to improve access to and the quality of education and healthcare worldwide, and provide support to communities in need worldwide.
teams.description: Our team consists of Polycom employees, friends, and family members.  Through telepresence, video, voice, and network solutions, Polycom enables the highest quality collaboration among people at a distance.  [Polycom and other companies may match donations made to fund Kiva.org's operations!]

teams.description: Employees of IBM who care to make a difference by funding unique ideas and activities through loans.

teams.loan_because: One of the best ways to effect change in the world is at the community and individual level!

teams.name: Pollenizer.com
teams.loan_because: We lend with Kiva because, well, we believe everybody should.
teams.description: Our clients are internet startups and the investors who back them.  Basically, our company helps little businesses with big plans grow. So we love Kiva because it helps individuals do the same thing - grow a sustainable business.

teams.name: MTSU Blue Raiders
teams.loan_because: Our head start in life is our education, and we are so fortunate to have that opportunity. As a result, we are dedicated to giving others their head start, too.
teams.description: A diverse body dedicated to creating more opportunity for those willing to accept the challenge of bettering their lives through entrepreneurship.

teams.name: Wonga.com
teams.loan_because: We provide an innovative short-term cash advance service to consumers and really like what Kiva is doing with micro finance.
teams.description: Everyone at Wonga loves what Kiva is doing and gets a big kick from helping entrepreneurs in the developing world. We're entrepreneurs ourselves and so we understand the desire to change things for the better and take control of your destiny.

teams.name: Boycrush
teams.loan_because: boycrush cares
teams.description: Employees, models and fans of boycrush

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner_default_max=0.5&partner_risk_rating_min=1&partner_risk_rating_max=5&partner_arrears_min=0&partner_arrears_max=1.1&sortBy=repaymentTerm
Hjelp med "expiring loans": http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans/#fundraising_loans

Hjelp med "postdisbursed" lån:
http://kivatools.com/fundraising/postdisbursedloans

Kiva tools:
https://www.kiva.org/portfolio/collections
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kiva-country-collector/
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kfpc/
http://www.kivalens.org

Da har vi nådd målet på 2 million dollar utlånt. Takk til alle som har bidratt!

teams.loan_because: We care!
teams.description: We are a caring family that just wants to help!

teams.loan_because: We wish to creating prosperity and health for all

teams.name: Norwegian Developers
teams.loan_because: we should.

teams.name: milepoint
teams.loan_because: As travelers we have seen poverty first hand and are committed to making the world a better place for all.
teams.description: Travelers who collect miles and points and seek free flights, hotel rooms and upgrades where possible. Here we seek to give back and invite everyone to join with us and make a difference.

teams.name: Kiva Mormons

teams.loan_because: We support the growth of people, communities, and business across the globe.
teams.description: We are made up of BYU students, alumni, and friends.  We understand that everyone, whether a student or a doctor, can lend to make a difference to someone on the other side of the planet.

teams.name: Central Illinois Lutherans

teams.name: Pittsburgh

teams.description:

We come together to make a change in our world.

Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/KivaPittsburgh

www.facebook.com/KivaPittsburgh

teams.name: Statoil
teams.loan_because:
Management and employees of Statoil who want to show social responsibility inline with the company ethics; 
On the basis of a clear set of values, we will work profitably and safely while also taking account of the environment and showing social responsibility.

teams.name: Calgary, Canada
teams.loan_because: Living in such a great city as Calgary with all the opportunities that entails, surely we can make an effort to help others less fortunate. We all can make a big difference with just a small loan.
teams.description:
This team is for residents of Calgary, former residents, people wtih friends and family here or for anyone who really loves the city!

To those who do not wish to receive an email when messages are posted to the board, there is a simple fix: Go to your portfolio, then your account, then email preferences and you can disable/enable from there. I myself have turned it off as I am a member of several groups and do not want to receive masses of emails.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Kiva Capitalists
teams.loan_because: Capital and business make the world go round; trade is a stabilizing force. Offering non-usurious loans to help people start businesses to provide others with goods and services they need or want is what capitalism is all about. We are all proud capitalists, and some of us are even unrepentant.
teams.description: Free markets, free minds. Hayek, Mises, Friedman.

teams.name: Temang gang, Temiscaming
teams.loan_because: we want to help others
teams.description: Small community getting together to help others.

teams.name: Google
teams.loan_because: It's not evil!
teams.description: A group of Google employees

teams.name: Team Reddit!
teams.loan_because: We redditors believe change is something that we should all take responsibility for.
teams.description: A group of people from the social news website reddit - started not by reddit admins, but by redditors themselves.

teams.name: Unitarian Universalist Church of Berkeley
teams.loan_because: Our faith calls us to respect the inherent worth and dignity of all people, and to contribute toward the goal of world community with peace, liberty, and justice for all.

teams.name: University of Wisconsin-Madison
teams.loan_because: We believe we can make a change in this world.
teams.description: Students, staff, faculty, and alumni of University of Wisconsin-Madison get together to participate in microfinancing.  We are very enthusiastic about it.

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Non-redneck Albertans (yes, we do exist)
teams.loan_because: There is more to life than digging for and burning fossil fuels.

teams.name: Calgary, Canada
teams.loan_because: Living in such a great city as Calgary with all the opportunities that entails, surely we can make an effort to help others less fortunate. We all can make a big difference with just a small loan.

teams.name: Colbert Nation
teams.loan_because: I am helping my fellow wealthy American friends lighten their swollen pockets to help the rest of the world prosper.
teams.description: Stephen Colbert is the host and executive producer of the Emmy-nominated series on Comedy Central, "The Colbert Report." Touted by the New York Times as "one of the best television shows of the year" and praised as "a must-watch show" by Entertainment Weekly, "The Colbert Report" has garnered ratings and critical success as one of the top shows on television.

teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***
Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

***OTHER RESOURCES:***
Starfish List:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/

KivaLens:
http://www.kivalens.org/

KivaTools:
http://kivatools.com/

Toolkit for analyzing Kiva data:
http://build.kiva.org/

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: Generation Give
teams.loan_because: we'd like to help
teams.description: A group of people with common interests

teams.name: Copacetic
teams.loan_because: we share a legacy of generosity.

teams.name: Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster
teams.loan_because:
"Thou shalt share, that none may seek without funding."   A nod to VII.  of “RANDOM NUMBER OF NOT COMMANDMENTS, SUGGESTIONS"  in the LOOSE CANON:
http://www.loose-canon.info/page17.htm
teams.description:
Members of the Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster  

Secular vs religious Field Partners, see links at http://atheist-monkey.blogspot.de/2009/08/kiva-mfi-checker.html

For Kiva tips and who knows what the FSM will move us to add for mutual benefit & merriment:  
http://flyingspaghettikivans.blogspot.it/    

and
  https://www.facebook.com/pages/FlyingSpaghettiKivans

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: Team USA
teams.loan_because: We believe in the generosity of the human spirit that is still alive within Americans of all backgrounds.

teams.description: Friends and family lending in lieu of a traditional wedding gift.

teams.name: The Keedas
teams.loan_because: We would like to share our good fortune
teams.description: Another Keeda family project: maintaining the Koziwoda tradition of helping where we can

teams.name: Michiganders
teams.loan_because: We believe in the power of micro lending.
teams.description: A group of individuals that share a common geographic location and are passionate about what the future holds for micro lending.

teams.name: University of Maryland
teams.loan_because: We loan because of many reasons, but we are joined by the years we spent at College Park, though not necessarily at the same time.
teams.description: This group represents the University of Maryland in all its Black and Gold glory.

teams.name: Open Development
teams.loan_because: We want to open development.
teams.description: Development should be open. Experiences shared.

teams.name: Needles for Change
teams.loan_because: we want to help women around the world help themselves.
teams.description: We are a group of friends who met through a common love of stitching (cross stitching, sampler work, etc.) We are choosing to make loans through Kiva  to honor each other and all those around the world who love or make their living through needlework.

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Calgary, Canada
teams.loan_because: Living in such a great city as Calgary with all the opportunities that entails, surely we can make an effort to help others less fortunate. We all can make a big difference with just a small loan.
teams.description:
This team is for residents of Calgary, former residents, people wtih friends and family here or for anyone who really loves the city!

To those who do not wish to receive an email when messages are posted to the board, there is a simple fix: Go to your portfolio, then your account, then email preferences and you can disable/enable from there. I myself have turned it off as I am a member of several groups and do not want to receive masses of emails.

teams.name: Open Development
teams.loan_because: We want to open development.
teams.description: Development should be open. Experiences shared.

teams.name: Open Development
teams.loan_because: We want to open development.
teams.description: Development should be open. Experiences shared.

teams.name: JBIC
teams.loan_because: D.J. told us to.
teams.description: A group of good friends.

teams.name: Chevron Team
teams.loan_because:
Join today and make a loan for a chance to win!

We want to help individuals move towards an improved life for themselves, their families and their communities.
teams.description: We are Chevron employees, families and friends who care about the well being of people in our communities.

teams.name: HALF THE SKY: Empowering Women
teams.loan_because: we believe empowering women is the key to alleviating social injustice and achieving world stability.
teams.description:
Inspired by the book HALF THE SKY written by Nicholas Kristof and Sheryl WuDunn, our team is committed to helping curb culturally accepted abuse of women around the world.

Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/HALFTHESKYEmpoweringWomenKIVATeam

teams.name: Team Gay Canadians and Gay Friendly Canadians
teams.loan_because: We care.

teams.name: Being the change we wish to see
teams.loan_because: we are not attached to money, and we know that money is like energy, and positive thought.  If you give it away willingly it will come back to you in abundance
teams.description: we have made it part of our livelihood to give what is ours to others, letting go of ownership, and supporting people around the world

teams.name: Washington State
teams.loan_because: Each of us has a responsibility to all of us.

teams.name: BookClubContributors
teams.loan_because: we enjoy giving to women who are making the world a better place!
teams.description: A group of about 20 women who once all worked together that have met once a month for over 8 years to discuss a book, share a meal and support each other.  Each December book club we contribute to local families in need and started to also loan via KIVA in December 2008

teams.description: The Hieger family has decided to give to the people of the world rather  than the needs of just the immediate family.  We hope that through the use of Kiva microloans our family will have a positive impact upon the world.

teams.name: Startup Founders - every individual and business has the power to make a difference

teams.loan_because: God has called us to give.
teams.description: We are a local Christian church in Austin, MN.

teams.name: Kiva Team Captains
teams.loan_because: We want to bring people together to raise awareness about Kiva in our communities.
teams.description: This group is about empowering Team Captains to become Community Marketers.  It is our goal to provide Kiva's biggest advocates with more tools to spread the word about Kiva.

teams.name: Whitworth University
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: Since 1890, Whitworth University has held fast to its founding mission of providing "an education of mind and heart" through rigorous intellectual inquiry guided by dedicated Christian scholars. Recognized as one of the top regional colleges and universities in the West, Whitworth University has an enrollment of nearly 3,000 students and offers 60 undergraduate and graduate degree programs. In recent years, Whitworth has enjoyed record levels of student enrollment and retention, the strongest financial position in the university's history, and increased external visibility.

teams.name: University of Washington
teams.loan_because: This is a great way for a small individual effort have a huge impact for positive change and growth. Through microfinance and small-credit loans, we give others around the world the chance to realize their potential without removing the freedom of entrepreneurship and good business.
teams.description: The University of Washington (or UDub) is a large public university in Seattle, Washington committed to making a difference.

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: Team Grace
teams.description: We are a group of people who lend in memory of Grace L Legere.

teams.name: Washington State
teams.loan_because: Each of us has a responsibility to all of us.

teams.name: Socially Responsible Silicon Valley
teams.loan_because: Provided with every opportunity to succeed, we as individuals of Silicon Valley, a place known as much for excess as innovative thinking, have an unparalleled capacity to help those in need. This valley was founded by innovative business, which we feel deserves support wherever it is recognized.
teams.description: A group of Silicon Valley lenders dedicated to recognizing innovation in business.

teams.name: North Dakota State University
teams.loan_because: Our tripartite mission at the university is: teaching, research, and SERVICE.
teams.description: NDSU alumni

teams.name: Chicago
teams.loan_because: we care....
teams.description: Chicago has a big heart.

teams.name: 6 degrees of separation
teams.loan_because: We know how much of an impact this money can make in someone's life, and we can!
teams.description: A group of people connected through friends, family and travel

teams.name: Team Martin
teams.loan_because: We can
teams.description: Martin family of Glen Forrest, Western Australia now scattered to the winds

teams.name: ROCK MY SOLES
teams.loan_because: We teach to fish
teams.description: More than you expect

teams.name: SF Bay Area
teams.loan_because: We can and we want to.
teams.description: Relaxed. No competition nor pressure to lend.

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Family Giving
teams.loan_because: We care.

teams.name: An Empowered Woman
teams.loan_because: We want to empower women.
teams.description: A community of empowered women professionals and entreprenuers located all over the world.

teams.name: Australian Gay, Lesbian and Friends
teams.loan_because: We really care about people.
teams.description: A very diverse minority group that believes in living and letting others live the way they chose.

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Shift Happens
teams.loan_because: Shift Happens, and we want to be the change we want to see.
teams.description:
We started with one education blogger, we'll see how far it goes.
http://thefischbowl.blogspot.com/2008/12/give-until-it-feels-good-join-team.html and http://thefischbowl.blogspot.com/2008/12/kiva-update-and-not-so-modest-proposal.html for more info.

teams.name: Florida State University
teams.loan_because: The team members want to give back to the world through Kiva loans.

teams.name: Nature Surfers
teams.loan_because: We would like to venture in small scale business of rearing cat-fish for commerical market.  Being a pensioner with high cost of children upbringing, my dream of trying on something that could change my nightmare is left an unfinish dream.
teams.description: I seek no sympathy nor pity from anyone but a sincerity and purity of one's heart. Thank you.

teams.name: Unitarian Society of Santa Barbara
teams.loan_because: As Unitarian Universalists, we believe in freedom, economic justice, and the inherent worth and dignity of all people.
teams.description: We are a liberal church in Santa Barbara, California.

teams.name: Joomla!
teams.loan_because: Joomla!(tm) is community-built content management software that is given away for free and those that benefit from Joomla can given something back and made an even bigger difference to the world.
teams.description: Joomla users, developers, designers - anyone who has used Joomla and benefited from the hard work of others.  Please note this team is not officially affiliated with the Joomla project or OSM.

teams.name: Artful - Web+Print+Design
teams.loan_because: We are ethical businesses and families. We enjoy helping other businesses and families around the world succeed and prosper. Its fun to use the web to help make a better world.
teams.description: For all the clients and friends of Artful Co. This team is a great way to promote Kiva to all the people we enjoy working with. We enjoy creating great websites in Joomla and Wordpress and effective print and design. If you like the idea of Kiva we'd love to work with you too.

teams.name: Finland
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Finland

teams.name: ArcticStartup community
teams.loan_because: We want to make the world a better place to live in - through entrepreneurship.
teams.description: We are the readers of ArcticStartup, entrepreneurs in the Nordics and Baltics, investors, or any other stakeholder being affiliated with entrepreneurship. We're looking to create a better ecosystem for entrepreneurship in the Nordics and Baltics, but wish to help people elsewhere as well.

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Supporting Widows and Single Parents
teams.loan_because: Widows and single parents face unique challenges in life. We just want to make it a bit easier for them.
teams.description: We loan to entrepreneurs who have been widowed or who are single parents.

teams.name: KARADUMAN
teams.loan_because: TO CHANGE SOMETHING IN THE WORLD.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Unitarian Universalists
teams.loan_because:
We believe in:
**The inherent worth and dignity of every person
**Justice, equity and compassion in human relations
**Acceptance of one another and encouragement to spiritual growth in our congregations
**A free and responsible search for truth and meaning
**The right of conscience and the use of the democratic process within our congregations and in society at large
**The goal of world community with peace, liberty, and justice for all
**Respect for the interdependent web of all existence of which we are a part.
teams.description:
We are UU congregations and individuals (including those who describe themselves as "active" or "backslid" or "interested friends" or "just looking") throughout the world. 
For more information on us, or to find a congregation near you, check out the main website for the Unitarian Universalist Association

teams.name: Supporters of Tajikistan
teams.loan_because: ...Tajikistan ranks as the poorest country in Central Asia.
teams.description: A team for those seeking to learn more about Tajikistan and support its entrepreneurs.

teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: LLamas for Obama!
teams.loan_because: We care, we can, and we should.
teams.description: A small group of friends  who care and can be silly, but we are serious about helping others.

teams.name: Nurses and other Health Professionals
teams.loan_because: We care about doing real things to alleviate human suffering.
teams.description: We welcome all health professionals and also those who care about health issues and relieving suffering.  Whoever you are, let's work together to encourage each other in support of Kiva's microloans and the entreprenuers they fund.

teams.name: Toronto and GTA
teams.loan_because: we care.
teams.description: Canadians reaching out to the rest of the world and helping any which way we can.

teams.name: EMS Mariners Kiva Supporters
teams.loan_because: we can, because we care, and because we want people who are less advantaged to have the opportunity to improve their lives and the lives of their families.
teams.description: We are a group of students at Earl Marriott Secondary School. We invite you to join us in making someone's life better by making micro-loans and joining our own lending endeavours.

teams.name: Disabled Persons
teams.loan_because: This is a community of people interested in making a difference for entrepreneurs  and families who are affected by illness or physical, intellectual, or psychiatric disability.  We also support caregivers, entrepreneurs involved in the medical profession and anyone who is touched in any way by disabilities, chronic illnesses or one time medical needs.
teams.description:
Anyone who has an interest in disability issues or rights may join our team. This team was started as a way to find and keep track of Kiva entrepreneurs who are affected by illnesses or disabilities so that we might see what kind of difference we are making in the lives of these entrepreneurs. 

This team was originally created by a group of KivaFriends, but has always been open to anyone.  If you are interested, you can read about the team history here:

teams.name: From Deaf To Deaf
teams.loan_because: Deaf Community is strong, but some are stronger than others just because of the place they've born. This way we can compensate this.
teams.description: We are Deaf Community members and we want to help Deaf Entrepeneurs in the world.

teams.name: Together - Estamos Juntos
teams.loan_because: We are all Together in this World.
teams.description: Extreme and dedicated professional team focused in delivering high quality software products.

teams.name: hi5 Community on Kiva!
teams.loan_because: “Kiva’s principles of entrepreneurship, serving a global community, and leveraging the power of crowds are very complementary to hi5’s mission, so it seems only natural that we join them in the fight to help eradicate poverty in many parts of the developing world,” said Ramu Yalamanchi, CEO of hi5. “By linking our user base with the profiles of Kiva entrepreneurs, we are connecting a diverse group of people who want to change our world for the better and ensure the right resources exist to do it.”
teams.description: Headquartered in San Francisco, hi5 is one of the world’s largest and fastest growing social networks and mobile web networks. Our focus is to empower our users to build and maintain connections between friends and family online. With over 56 million unique visitors every month, hi5 is a top 20 website globally and the number one social network in 31 countries across Latin America, Europe, Asia and Africa. The service is available in 37 languages, delivering localized content and applications to users worldwide.

teams.name: Singapore
teams.loan_because: every effort matters, every offered hand deserves another, and any contribution counts.
teams.description: Our efforts might be small but they're a big difference to someone else, and ever so worth it.

teams.name: hi5 Community on Kiva!
teams.loan_because: “Kiva’s principles of entrepreneurship, serving a global community, and leveraging the power of crowds are very complementary to hi5’s mission, so it seems only natural that we join them in the fight to help eradicate poverty in many parts of the developing world,” said Ramu Yalamanchi, CEO of hi5. “By linking our user base with the profiles of Kiva entrepreneurs, we are connecting a diverse group of people who want to change our world for the better and ensure the right resources exist to do it.”

Our focus is to empower our users to build and maintain connections between friends and family online. With over 56 million unique visitors every month, hi5 is a top 20 website globally and the number one social network in 31 countries across Latin America, Europe, Asia and Africa. The service is available in 37 languages, delivering localized content and applications to users worldwide.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Kiva Jews
teams.loan_because: Tikkun Olam - making the world a better place.
teams.description: One of Judaism's most famous scholars, Maimonides, said that the highest form of charity is to help someone no longer need charity - and lending to Kiva does that.

teams.name: Microsoft
teams.description: Employees of Microsoft who care about making the world a better place through loans.

teams.name: Arizona State University (ASU) Students/Alumni
teams.loan_because: We're Devils that care!
teams.description: College students and alumni of ASU who donate to Kiva.org

teams.name: KiVegas (Las Vegas Kiva)
teams.loan_because: It is our way of paying back for the millions of visitors to Las Vegas and the hope that many others might one day visit Las Vegas or basically a more productive way to invest funds we might otherwise lose at the craps table.
teams.description: Those who love Las Vegas, and those beloved of Las Vegas

teams.name: Ad Rem Young Professionals
teams.description: Ad Rem Young Professionals is a Dutch professional recruitment company, specialising in the placement of young professionals with 0-5 years of work expercience in permanent, contract and temporary positions.

teams.name: Nasioc OT
teams.loan_because: We can
teams.description: We are a group of Subaru car enthusiasts who like to help when we can.

teams.name: Team Sherdog
teams.loan_because: Be the change you want to see in the world
teams.description: We are a group of mixed martial arts enthusiasts who enjoys helping others.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/
